name: Decrypt
description:
When a freight ship goes missing and is later found abandoned, you must investigate it to solve the mystery of its missing crew.

The GiS Trade Federation believes that the crew has abandoned the ship to evade crippling trade fines in a brutal interstellar economy.  But what you will uncover is a far more insidious and horrifying truth. 


Features:

  • First-person sci-fi survival-horror adventure
  • Story rich gameplay - piece together a compelling narrative to discover the fate of the Travan's crew
  • Deep Exploration - traverse the ship to  locate Terminals to progress
  • All original soundtrack 
  • Bite-sized thrill - 45 mins - 1 hour playtime!
  • Intense scares
